ing: 1/4 cup fresh blueberries, or more to taste
des: "Get all the colors of the rainbow and the full spectrum of health benefits from drinking this unbelievably delicious concoction of fresh juices. Nutritionists agree that you should get fresh fruits and vegetables daily that encompass the colors of the rainbow, each for a specific benefit. Please remember to use organic fruits and vegetables. Instant energy in a glass!"
ins: Run beets, carrots, oranges, spinach, blueberries, and ginger through a juicer according to manufacturer's instructions.
